Verses: 1 yosiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu Ettuvayadhaayirundhu, Muppaththoru Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan.
2 avan Karththarudaiya Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhu, Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Vazhigalil, Valadhu Idadhupuramaaga Vilagaamal Nadandhaan.

3 avan Than Raajyabaaraththin Ettaam Varushaththil, Innum Ilavayadhaayirukkaiyil, Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Dhevanaith Theda Aarambiththu, Pannirandaam Varushaththil Medaigal Thoppugal Suroobangal Vikkiragangalaagiya Ivaigal Atruppogumpadi, Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemaiyum Suththigarikkath Thodanginaan.

4 avanukku Munbaagap Paagaalgalin Palipeedangalai Idiththaargal; Avaigalin Melirundha Silaigalai Vetti, Vikkirath Thoppugalaiyum Vaarppu Vikkiragangalaiyum Vettu Vikkiragangalaiyum Udaiththu Norukki, Avaigalukkup Paliyittavargaludaiya Predhakkuzhigalinmel Thoovi,
5 poojaasaarigalin Elumbugalai Avargaludaiya Peedangalinmel Sutteriththu, Ivvidhamaai Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemaiyum Suththigariththaan.
6 appadiye Avan Manaase Eppiraayeem Simiyon Ennum Pattanangalilum, Napthalimattum Paazhaana Avaigalin Sutruppurangalilum Seydhaan.
7 avan Isravel Dhesam Engumulla Palipeedangalaiyum Vikkiragaththoppugalaiyum Thagarththu, Vikkiragangalai Norukkith Thoolaakki, Ellaa Silaigalaiyum Vettippottapinbu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaan.

8 avan Dhesaththaiyum Aalayaththaiyum Suththigariththapinbu, Avan Than Raajyabaaraththin Padhinettaam Varushaththile, Adhsaliyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Saappaanaiyum, Nagaraththalaivanaagiya Maaseyaavaiyum, Yovaagaasin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaak Ennum Mandhiriyaiyum, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththaip Pazhudhupaarkkumpadikku Anuppinaan.

9 avargal Pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Ilkkiyaavinidaththil Vandhu, Vaasarpadiyaik Kaakkira Leviyar Manaaseyilum Eppiraayeemilum Isravelil Meedhiyaanavargalellaarin Kaiyilum Yoodhaa Benyameen Engum Serththu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbi Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththirkuk Konduvandha Panaththai Oppuviththu,

10 velaiyai Seyvikkumpadi, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Visaarippukkaararaanavargalin Kaiyil Adhaik Koduththaargal; Ivargal Adhaik Karththarudaiyaaalayaththaip Pazhudhupaarththu Seerppaduththugiradharku Aalayaththil Velaiseygiravargal Kaiyile Koduththaargal.

11 appadiye Yoodhaavin Raajaakkal Keduththuppotta Araigalaip Pazhudhupaarkka Vettina Karkalaiyum, Inaippukku Marangalaiyum, Paavugiradharku Palagaigalaiyum Vaangath Thachcharukkum Sirpaasaarigalukkum Adhaik Koduththaargal.

12 indha Manushar Velaiyai Unmaiyaai Seydhaargal; Velaiyai Nadaththa Meraariyin Puththiraril Yaagaadh Opadhiyaa Ennum Leviyarum, Kogaadhiyarin Puththiraril Sagariyaavum, Mesullaamum Avargalmel Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal; Indha Leviyar Ellaarum Keedhavaaththiyangalai Vaasikka Arindhavargal.

13 avargal Sumaikaararai Visaarikkiravargalaayum, Parpala Velaigalai Seygiravargal Ellaaraiyum Kankaanikkiravargalaayum Irundhaargal; Leviyaril Innum Silar Kanakkarum Maniyakaararum Vaasarkaavalaalarumaayirundhaargal.

14 karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuk Konduvarappatta Panaththai Avargal Edukkirapodhu Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyidappatta Karththarudaiya Nyaayappramaanap Pusthagaththai Aasaariyanaagiya Ilkkiyaa Kandeduththaan.
15 appozhudhu Ilkkiyaa Sambiradhiyaagiya Saappaanai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Nyaayappramaanap Pusthagaththaik Kandeduththen Endru Solli, Andhap Pusthagaththai Saappaan Kaiyil Koduththaan.
16 saappaan Andhap Pusthagaththai Raajaavinidaththirkuk Kondupoi, Avanai Nokki: Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukku Kattalaiyidappattavaigalaiyellaam Avargal Seygiraargal.
17 karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Serndha Panaththai Avargal Kootti, Adhai Visaarippukkaarar Kaiyilum, Velaiseygiravargal Kaiyilum Koduththaargal Endru Raajaavukku Maruseydhisonnadhum Allaamal,
18 aasaariyanaagiya Ilkkiyaa En Kaiyil Oru Pusthagaththaik Koduththaan Enbadhai Sambiradhiyaagiya Saappaan Raajaavukku Ariviththu, Raajaavukku Munbaaga Adhai Vaasiththaan.
19 nyaayappramaanaththin Vaarththaigalai Raajaa Kettapodhu, Avan Than Vasthirangal
